snippet: The governing body of athletics hit back at two scientists whose findings led to allegations of widespread doping in the sport, saying their assertions were “seriously incorrect.”
abstract: International Assn of Athletics Federations, governing body of athletics, asserts findings of two scientists who assert blood doping is rampant in athletics, are based on 'seriously incorrect' test results.
lead_paragraph: The governing body of athletics hit back at two scientists whose findings led to allegations of widespread doping in the sport, saying their assertions were “seriously incorrect.”
